title: Person Kneeling Medium Light Skin Tone
alsoKnownAs: Kneeling Person Medium Light Skin Tone
description: A person is kneeling, with their body bent at the knees and resting on the ground. This emoji often signifies prayer, begging, or humility. The medium-light skin tone indicates a specific representation of this action.
apple_vendor_description: The person kneeling emoji on Apple devices presents a medium-light skin tone in a pose of respectful humility or prayer. Rendered with Apple's characteristic smooth gradients and soft rounded edges, the figure conveys a sense of quiet reverence and earnestness. Realistic lighting adds a gentle depth, making it suitable for expressing gratitude, apology, or a plea for understanding.
